resources.string: All lessons have been solved ! You can choose to restart the game or exit the app
An error ocurred while attempting to load lessons. Please check your device has internet access and reload the app
An unexpected error occurred. Try again or exit and retry later. If the problem persists please reach out to our help center
You don\'t seem to be connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again or exit and retry later
An error occurred and we\'re working to fix the problem. Please exit and contact the help center or retry later
We\'re working on it and we\'ll get it fixed as soon as possible. Please exit and contact the help center or retry later
An unexpected error occurred. Try again or exit and retry later
We are sorry but, you are not permitted to see this. Please exit and contact the help center or retry later
